text: Hugo Rasmussen (22 March 1941 in Bagsværd - 30 August 2015) was a Danish bassist. He was best known for his 1978 album Sweets to the Sweet.Billboard 14 Jul 1979Walter Bruyninckx "Jazz: modern jazz, be-bop, hard bop, West Coast, Volume 5" – Page 1756 Sweets To the Sweet was re-released in 2001 on Danish label Music Mecca. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bassists Category:Danish musicians Category:Jazz musicians
title: Hugo Rasmussen
